name: Shirts VS Skins: Follow the Money
name_original: Shirts VS Skins: Follow the Money
description:
Hey hi! Here's the game I made with Vinny, Abby and Dan during Giant Beast's 2017 Extra Life stream. Enjoy this surprisingly promising prototype! :D

  • Requires 4 players with controllers
  • D-pad to move
  • A to strategically detonate bomb (doesn't hurt carrier)
  • Bomb will explode once it runs out of money, so be careful!

Included in the downloads is the original Construct 2 file in case you'd like to look at it, take it apart, and so on. Let's keep making wonderful things together! ❤
